creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky and the Ted and Dr. Roberta Mann Foundation Endowment Fund
description: abstracted image; couple dancing at right on top of a red star--woman with blue lips at left wears a black dress with green and pink flowers, pink heels, and a necklace of red beads; man at right wears white pants, pink and grey striped jacket with black lapels, turquoise shirt, and lavender shoes with high heels; view of water and rocks at left in background; green and yellow abstracted figures in LLC; yellow tapering lines on the diagonal across top half of sheet; Chinese text in white in ULC and seals in red in ULC and LRC; sheet mounted to black illustration board
signed: LLC in black and blue ink: C. Billops 1982 © Kaohsiung, Taiwan \"Boogying in Guangzhou\" #10
title: Boogying in Guangzhou
